item.title: Question about Unreal2 NPC's on Unreal
item.author: invalid@example.com (z28Nemesis)
item.dc:creator: z28Nemesis
item.content:encoded:
I've always been one that has fun playing around with the Unreal summoning system on single player, and was always able to summon various NPC's, weapons and projectiles on classic Unreal/Unreal Gold, but on Unreal II it got extra fun when I discovered I could summon the 3 marine styles as friendly allies and their personalities. I was wondering, is there a way to get the marines from Unreal II imported into Unreal Gold for summoning, and still retain their qualities? Been curious about this...

Question about Unreal2 NPC's on Unreal

item.title: [UT99] Lift help.
item.author: invalid@example.com (sunji)
item.dc:creator: sunji
item.content:encoded: I would like help with, or locationg a tutorial to help me with, creating a mover such as a lift. I, being new to UT Map creation, have found it hard to find such a tutorial, or anyone that is willing to help me with such a problem. Like I said I am new to map creation, so I would like a good tutorial that explains the why as well as the how. So if you have any great insight on where I can find tutorials, or are willing to offer a hand it would greatly be appreiciated.

item.title: UT2k4 Railgun Request
item.author: invalid@example.com (mattyd)
item.dc:creator: mattyd
item.content:encoded: The Q3A Railgun is my favorite quake III arena weapon (especially the curly bit on the railtrail!) As i Have No idea about coding/modelling Could anyone anyone make it for me!!!

item.title: Flak Shell Question
item.author: invalid@example.com (Gnam)
item.dc:creator: Gnam
item.content:encoded: Does anyone know what value in UT2004 controls how many flak chunks a shell (alt fire) releases on explosion? I would like to increase it.

item.title: VERY, VERY, VERY IMPORTANT (Yet very simple) MOD REQUEST
item.author: invalid@example.com (Kamunou Hyena)
item.dc:creator: Kamunou Hyena
item.content:encoded: You know how in Single Player it keeps track of your kills, deaths, sprees, hit ratio, weapon usage stats and all that stuff? My friend REALLY wants this made for instant action matches, he's getting bored with going in and winning all these matches and not having anything to show for it in the end. Please, PLEASE can somebody take a shot at this? I don't want my friend to quit playing..

item.title: I got an error i can't fix help!

Warning: MutWoRM_w CTF-1on1-Joust.MutWoRM_w (Function WoRM2k4.MutWoRM_w.CheckReplacement:008F) Accessed None 'GRI'

doesn't effect game play but i think it makes it lag when i switch weapons cuase that apears in the log alot 1.4 meg log per game

item.title: unlimited ammo mut

item.dc:creator: fender_ketchup
item.content:encoded: how do/could you make an unlimited ammo mutator that would work with arena matches? I have the little weapon pack that has it, but you can't have that, and the arena mutator. Much abliged

item.title: [2K4] Skin 3rd Person Help
item.author: invalid@example.com (DeathOmen)
item.dc:creator: DeathOmen
item.content:encoded:
Ok i have a super shock rifle, got the custom skin for first person gotta custom zoom... got it all figured out, but when i go into 3rd person, or see someone with the gun, the skins default... How would i make it so when u see someone in 3rd person it will show my skin? Thanks

-OmeN

item.title: Model difficulties
item.author: invalid@example.com (Neuroflare)
item.dc:creator: Neuroflare
item.content:encoded:
When a player spawns with the scram cannon (when using the ball launcher for the model) The weapon appears in the top middle of the screen. But shortly thereafter goes to its normal position. I put the default properties up because the rest of the code for it was bot ai stuff, so the problem must lie in there, i believe.

Also, since there is no pickup model for the ball launcher, I am using the attachment. But it rotates around the grip of the gun rather than and middle of it. How...

Model difficulties

item.title: A bit of help with some UT99 coding with teleporters
item.author: invalid@example.com (scunionman)
item.dc:creator: scunionman
item.content:encoded:
I've recently been doing some UT99 mapping and have had multiple needs for a teleporter that sets the player in a specified direction once he/she has teleported.

I ran across this code below and have tested it in online play. This code works great but there is no visible teleporter effect (like navpoint>teleporter>visibleteleporter (mesh effect))

After reading up on unreal script and giving it the good ol self try (which failed multiple times) I am unable to implement this visible...

A bit of help with some UT99 coding with teleporters

item.title: Problem with Link Gun
item.author: invalid@example.com (Gnam)
item.dc:creator: Gnam
item.content:encoded:
I doubled the fire rate on the link gun (actually probably closer to tripled it) so that it would be closer to dealing damage like an actual constant beam. Of course, to keep it balanced, I had to lower the damage to like 2 to make up for the increase. This works fine, except when healing for some reason it heals extremely slowly, as if it's using the new damage with the default firing rate. There must be some part of the heal code that cause the heal fire rate to be different from the...

Problem with Link Gun

item.title: player invulnerable
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ghost3021)
item.dc:creator: Ghost3021
item.content:encoded:
-[ut99]-player invulnerable

ok im making a single player mod and the player is a skaarj trooper. yay!
ok, i want to set it up so that when the player presses a key(on keyboard/mouse/joystick wichever they pics) the players model plays the shldup anim and loops shldhold until they let go. while shielded, no damage can be taken. a bar on hud will measure energy for shield, will normaly go down slowly but jumps if damage is taken, and will slowly recharge. the player cant fire while...

player invulnerable

item.dc:creator: Eyegore
item.content:encoded:
Hi guys,

Sorry I havn't been around in a while. The last 4 months were loaded with outside world crap. Lots of projects put on hold, etc...

But now, I've found myself again and I'm trying to get some projects finished and blah, blah... you know the story.

Anyway, I DL'ed the ECE pack and got to messin around with the SPMA. I like the concept of the MIRV, but for crying out loud, it only releases 5 warheads!! I have been able to kill only 1 bot with the damn thing!!

So i'm trying...

Changing properties...

item.title: Suggestion for the new worm 2k4 version
item.author: invalid@example.com ({GOD}Urbanite)
item.dc:creator: {GOD}Urbanite
item.content:encoded: Most custom maps like the shk saloon map or the shk rest room map call for the super intagib shock rifle, its very frustrating when you have regular weapons and limited ammo and some smuck can grap the intagib. It makes for uneven game play. My suggestion is include a replacement for the intagib super shock rifle as well. If it is possible.
